name: I'd Rather be Dead
description:
You are a grave robber who found a mysterious crystal in a tomb. Who knows what powers it may contain?

You must transcend between the mortal and spiritual realms to solve puzzles and make your way through. The spiritual realm can help you to see things that your mortal self cannot, but be warned; you cannot change back when your spiritual form moves too far away from your mortal self.

Your goal is to help your mortal self progress through the levels by using the powers of the mysterious crystal. Can you make it to the end?

Controls:

System Requirements: Windows 10.

Made for createChester by a team of 6 students: one L6, two L5s, and three L4s. The theme was "Benefit From Death".

Credits:

Level Design and Mentoring: Leon Robinson
Level Design and Environment Art: Sean Mayhew
Environment Art, Texturing and UI: Liberty Jones
Character Art: Rhys Taylor
Programming: George Cottrell
Programming: Nathan Kingston
